name: Stanford University

description: Crash course in PM, focusing on the product lifecycle from start to finish leveraging the double diamond framework.
Enhanced LinkedIn's job search experience by developing an innovative and engaging job search feature - ✨ LinkedIn Job Journeys ✨ - as part of the final capstone project.

Cool buzzwords to summarise: AI, ML, deep learning, neural networks, CNNs, NLP, GenAI and more!

name: University of Melbourne
